trans-unit.source: Provides a design-time user interface for selecting a Microsoft Access database file.
trans-unit.target: 提供設計階段使用者介面來選取 Microsoft Access 資料庫檔案。

trans-unit.source: An MdbDataFileEditor object is used at design time to select and edit a URL for a Microsoft Access database file (.mdb), and then assign the URL to a control property.
trans-unit.target: MdbDataFileEditor 物件在設計階段用來選取和編輯 URL Microsoft Access 資料庫檔案 (.mdb)，然後將 URL 指派給控制項屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource> control uses the MdbDataFileEditor class at design time to set the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource.DataFile%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>控制項會使用 MdbDataFileEditor 類別在設計階段設定的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource.DataFile%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource.DataFile%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute> attribute to associate the MdbDataFileEditor with a property.
When the associated property is edited on the design surface, the designer host calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UrlEditor.EditValue%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 當在設計介面上編輯相關聯的屬性時，設計工具主應用程式呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UrlEditor.EditValue%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UrlEditor.EditValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UrlEditor.EditValue%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UrlBuilder.BuildUrl%2A> method, which in turn displays a user interface for selecting the URL, and then returns the URL that is selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UrlEditor.EditValue%2A>方法會使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UrlBuilder.BuildUrl%2A>方法，即會顯示使用者介面，以選取 URL，然後傳回已由使用者選取的 URL。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UrlBuilder.BuildUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UrlEditor.EditValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UrlEditor.GetEditStyle%2A> method indicates the display style of the user interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UrlEditor.GetEditStyle%2A>方法會指出使用者介面的顯示樣式。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UrlEditor.GetEditStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Derive a class from the MdbDataFileEditor to define a custom editor for an Access database URL property.
trans-unit.target: 若要定義存取資料庫的 URL 屬性的自訂編輯器 MdbDataFileEditor 從衍生類別。

trans-unit.source: For example, a derived class can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UrlEditor.EditValue%2A> method, and then call the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UrlBuilder.BuildUrl%2A> method with a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.MdbDataFileEditor.Filter%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.MdbDataFileEditor.Caption%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在衍生的類別可以覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UrlEditor.EditValue%2A>方法，然後再呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UrlBuilder.BuildUrl%2A>方法搭配自訂<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.MdbDataFileEditor.Filter%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.MdbDataFileEditor.Caption%2A>值。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.MdbDataFileEditor.Caption%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.MdbDataFileEditor.Filter%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UrlBuilder.BuildUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UrlEditor.EditValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.MdbDataFileEditor"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.MdbDataFileEditor"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the caption to display on the selection dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 取得要顯示在 [選取範圍] 對話方塊上的標題。

trans-unit.source: The Caption string is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UrlEditor.EditValue%2A> method when calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UrlBuilder.BuildUrl%2A> method, which displays the URL selection dialog box to the user at design time.
trans-unit.target: 標題字串由<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UrlEditor.EditValue%2A>方法呼叫時<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UrlBuilder.BuildUrl%2A>方法，這個方法會向使用者顯示 URL 的 [選取範圍] 對話方塊，在設計階段。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UrlBuilder.BuildUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UrlEditor.EditValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The caption text to display on the selection dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 要顯示在 [選取範圍] 對話方塊上的標題文字。

trans-unit.source: Gets the URL filter options for the editor, which is used to filter the items that appear in the URL selection dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 取得編輯器中，用來篩選出現在 URL 的 [選取範圍] 對話方塊中的項目 URL 篩選選項。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents one or more URL filter options for the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 字串，代表一或多個 URL 的篩選選項 對話方塊。
